Quickstride raises his hand politely.  He wanted to see where Windlord had =
gone.   Tucson senses movement in the room and turns his head to Quickstrid=
e.

" Yes, Quickstride, you want to ask something?"

Quickstride nods.  Luc=
ky for him, Tucson's expression loosens up a bit.

" Yes Sir.  Permission t=
o be excused for a few minutes?"

Tucson nods. 

" Permission granted, take=
 all the time you need."

With permission granted, Quickstride transforms i=
nto beast mode and trots off to find Windlord.   He trots by the med bay th=
en perks his ears up, following the source of Windlord's footsteps until he=
 clip clops into the training room.

"Windlord, are you okay?"

Perpetually=
 on the move and constantly busy. 

On Jun 29, 2011, at 5:49 PM, Airshadow =
Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:

>

imes (Cue: All Maximals & Autobots)

> 
> Tucson's expression doesn't=
 change .  In fact it seemed to become rather fierce as if he had a mortal =
enemy in front of him.  His words were  being contradicted and that was one=
 of his greatest pet peeves.  At any moment it seemed that he would easily =
thrust an angry fist clear through the table but he restrains himself from =
doing so.  Straight Shot looks at Wheelie with a bit of concern.
>  
> " Oh=
h boy, Wheelie I think you better not lash out at Tucson any more.  First o=
f, he's a Prime, and we never contradict a prime.  Second, his bite is as b=
ad as his bark.  Just picture Ratchet but a thousand times worse" .  Third,=
 keep it up and he will send you through walls effortlessly. "
>  
> Night =
Shift nods in agreement. "
>  
> " Oh yeah, she's got that right.  I've see=
n what happens when ya cross Tucson's line.  And you're just a toe length a=
way from feel'n his fury."
>  
> Tucson turns his attentions to the group.
=
>  
> " I may be blind but I'm not without logic circuitry.  Leo Prime call=
ed this meeting to discuss matters of importance, not for singling out comr=
ades and commanders for ridicule!  Now if one more shred of ridicule is thr=
own out on this table, I will demand that the individual responsible, be es=
corted out of this room IMMEDIATELY!  THAT IS AN ORDER!"
>  
> His fist goe=
s down hard on the table, causing it to vibrate.  Rat Trap straightens up o=
n his chair as he pays close attention to Tucson.
>  
> " Ulp, yep, he's ma=
d, really, really mad."
> 
> Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.
>=

Some crash
>> landed, some traveled here to help with the threat of Unicron=
 and his
>> minions." He gave WHEELIE and TUSCON a look, "We are all here t=
o
>> help."
>> 
>> RODIMUS PRIME stepped up behind WHEELIE, or as close as =
he could get
>> to the fast moving robot, and if possible laid a friendly h=
and on his
>> shoulder. "Calm down, we are all friends here right?" With th=
at last
>> word RODIMUS looked at TUSCON as well to be sure that he got the=
 point
>> to cool down on his famous temper.
>> 
>> LEO was on the stage lo=
oking sternly across the floor as he gripped
>> the podium, dealing with an=
ger issues of his own. "This is NOT going
>> to solve our issues." He glanc=
ed at KUP, TUSCON, WHEELIE and a few
>> others, "Everyone, please retake yo=
ur seats." He said in a firm voice
>> in an effort to get the meeting back =
under control.
>> 
>> Looking over at LORD ELDER, LEO PRIME gestured, "If y=
ou would go see
>> about Windlord?"
>> 
>> ELDER nodded as he got up from h=
is seat walked towards the same exit
>> of the room that WINDLORD had just =
used.
